channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25198|2024-08-03T04:36:05.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin 1.8 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-25199|2024-08-03T04:36:06.621Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SCP publisher Plugin 1.8 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.
